book/device sleeve pattern skill one size - customisable advanced beginner terminology gauge blocked us terms gauge not important 5 rnds = 4 5 x4 5 abbreviations 11 5cmx11 5cm in double crochet stitch with 4mm chain s chain s crochet hook *refer to yo yarn over diagram on page 5 st s stitch es measurements chain space chain space square 12 x 12 30 5cm x 30 5cm puff puff after blocking mc magic_ring final sleeve size 8 25 x 6 25 20 9cm x 15 88cm slip_stitch slip_stitch note you can customise the size of your square to fit any book round s round s or electronic device refer to general notes section how to beg beginning measure and pattern instructions on how to make double_crochet double_crochet this repeat repeat yarn/yardage james c brett dk #3 weight 100%cotton 100g/215m/234yds in shade ic12 for my sample i used approx 63g/134 8m/147 4yds ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira special stitches and technique puff puff yo insert hook into space pull up a long loop there is 3 loops on the hook yo insert hook into same space pull up a long loop there is now 5 loops on the hook yo insert hook into same space pull up a long loop there is now 7 loops on the hook yo insert hook into same space pull up a long loop there is now 9 loops on the hook yo pull through 8 loops on the hook yo pull through the remain loops on the hook to make the puff yo pull through yo pull through 9 loops on hook 8 loops last 2 loops mattress stitch join here is a video from happily hooked crochet magazine on youtube for guidance on how to join https //youtu be/sd2hlxkftc4 ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira materials any #3 dk weight yarn or your preferred choice crochet hook recommended by yarn or your preferred choice scissors stitch markers tapestry needle 1 button blocking material optional general notes ch3 at beginning of row counts as a double_crochet stitch ch4 at beginning of round counts as double crochet stitch and chain 1 you will be working in rounds so do not turn your work at end of rounds you will be making a square then sew to join and form the sleeve and finally attach a button for closure you can increase/decrease square in 2 different ways on the continuous granny square section at the beginning or the size of the square itself in the
